note:
Creator of many GNOME things including Builder, Sysprof, Manuals, Text Editor, Ptyxis, D-Spy, Schemes, libgom, libspelling, libdex, jsonrpc-glib, template-glib, deviced. GtkSourceView and libpeas maintainer. Inventor of the PieceTable/B+Tree hybrid data-structure. GTK core contributor.

This account is for people I know IRL and other GNOME foundation members.
